study.name: Tuberculosis subtypes in human male, blood study with arrays
study.description: Tuberculosis subtypes in blood samples of human males (BB). Jean Chang, Eric Weitz, Jon Bistline, Eno-Abasi Augustine-Akpan, Devon Bush, Vicky Horst. Journal of SCP Synthetic Studies. Volume 1, p1, February 2020. Adding synthetic study data to development and staging environments has been shown to improve testability of new code. We extend those findings to the Single Cell Portal by adding this synthetic data.
